name: Troll, Breakwater
description: The Breakwater Troll has a strong presence with its large stature, combined with a robust build and chaotic nature. Its skin is often slimy, and it can be found lurking in both water and on land, ready to strike at any moment.
memorable: It possesses incredible regeneration abilities, allowing it to heal rapidly, making it a challenging opponent in combat.
goals: Typically, it seeks to dominate its aquatic territory and confront any threats that intrude.
relations: Often found in coastal areas, it may interact with other aquatic creatures, potentially leading or serving aquatic beasts.
environment: Coastal regions, rivers, and swamps; thrives in both aquatic and terrestrial environments.
strengths: High hit points and resistance to many damage types, making it exceedingly tough in battle.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to lightning and force damage which can disrupt its regeneration ability.
attacks: Can perform multiattack with powerful Slam and Water Blast, effectively dealing bludgeoning and cold damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Surge ability, which pushes enemies back while dealing extensive damage in a wide line.
skills: It has a +2 modifier in perception, allowing it to be reasonably aware of its surroundings.
additional_information: Can breathe both air and water.
Immune to paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, and prone conditions.
Uses environment advantageously, especially in aquatic combat.
test_queries: tough giant creature from coastal areas
monster that can breathe underwater and regenerate
breakwater troll attacks using water blasts
formidable giant with bludgeoning and cold abilities
